definition: variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)

sentences.chinese: 一個斑駁又破碎的夢境。

sentences.english: To mark or mottle with spots.
Acamouflaged shape moving through the sun-dappled shadows.
sentences.chinese: 一個保護色的身形在陽光斑駁的陰影中移動。

sentences.english: Mountains, now refreshingly green in the distant shores, made vacillating reflections in the water.
sentences.chinese: 遠岸的重山透出清新的綠，在水中映出斑駁的倒影。

sentences.english: How light the sleeping on this soil y star.
sentences.chinese: 多麼輕，睡在這斑駁的星燦。

sentences.english: The prone shadows with their outstretched arms clung to the feet of the hurrying light.
sentences.chinese: 竹影斑駁錯落，掙扎著纏繞光陰匆忙的步履。

sentences.english: The funduscopic examination showed diffuse mottling of the retinal pigmented epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 眼底鏡檢顯示視網膜色素上皮斑駁化。

sentences.english: White patches at the base of the chimney are microbial mats.
sentences.chinese: 噴口基部的白色斑駁是原核生物叢聚。

sentences.english: Brown Ben scratched at his speckled grey-and-white whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 棕色的本撓了撓他斑灰白斑駁的鬍鬚。

sentences.english: We sing fairy tale songs and our sleep is dappled with fairy tale leitmotifs.
sentences.chinese: 我們大唱童話歌曲，就連夢境也滿是斑駁的童話主題。

sentences.english: On his strong shoulders, mottled and spotted, shed the shadow of lunar light.
sentences.chinese: 斑駁月影，疏落地，撒滿他寬闊強健的肩膀。

sentences.english: The mottled fishing boats move along.
sentences.chinese: 斑駁的漁船在海上行進。

sentences.english: Under the mottled shade of the moon how long time.
sentences.chinese: 月光下的樹影斑駁了多久時間。

sentences.english: Reflection of old housing as black and white ink paintings.
sentences.chinese: 枕河人家如墨色般倒影在黑白斑駁的光影中。

sentences.english: Grim cement buildings covered in peeling paint rise from the cracked pavement.
sentences.chinese: 水泥建築外牆上的油漆已經剝落，地面也斑駁碎裂。

sentences.english: Just, time passed, the rundown, going to see, have deep.
sentences.chinese: 只是，時間流轉，燈影殘缺，今夕見時，已有斑駁。

definition: simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
great changes/ups and downs/vicissitudes/abbr. of 滄海桑田|沧海桑田[cang1 hai3 sang1 tian2]
